front.title: Address autoconfiguration for MANETs: definition and problem statement

abstract.t: A Mobile Ad Hoc NETwork (MANET) is formed by the association ofmobile devices, usually wireless and capable of multi-hopcommunication among themselves even if there is no networkinginfrastructure available. MANET properties such as multi-hop,autonomous, etc requires separate address autoconfigurationmechanism. This document provides definition, problem statement andgoals for ad hoc networks address autoconfiguration.
